PositionHistory.Description:
Client: Oracle Description: The main purpose of this project is to enhance the ODI - Oracle Data Integrator to support SAP R/3 and SAP BW data extraction. To enable ODI to support SAP ERP and BW/BI data extraction the following ODI Knowledge Modules have been implemented:
* SAP BW Reverse - engineering Knowledge Module (SAP RKM) ; * SAP BW Loading Knowledge Module (SAP LKM) Environment: ODI, TOAD, SAPR/3, SAP BW/BI, Oracle10g,
Role: Testing Consultant Responsibilities:

PositionHistory.Title: Testing Consultant
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: Oracle Hyperion BI Tools and SAP BW Integration Client: Oracle Description: Web Analysis, workspace and Interactive Reporting are the reporting tools of Oracle Hyperion Business Intelligence Suite. These reporting tools deliver powerful, intuitive, Web-based interactive analytics to all corners of the enterprise. A highly graphical and easy-to-use interactive interface, it enables users to view their data in a way that makes sense to them. The objective of this project is to enhance the above mentioned reporting tools to support SAP BW data extraction.
Environment: SAP BW3.5/BI 7.0, Web Analysis, Workspace, Interactive Reporting tool, UNIX
Role: Testing Consultant
Responsibilities:

SchoolOrInstitution.Comments: * B.Sc (Comp) from Madras University, Chennai, Completed on April on 2000. ;

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Balaji T has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 10 years. Currently he is employed as a Senior Associate/Test Coordinator at Health Net Inc. Balaji has extensive knowledge of SAP Netweaver > SAP BW, Oracle BI EE, Oracle, SAP R/3, Oracle 10G, TOAD, Regression Testing, ODI, ETL, SAP-FI- Reporting, SQL, SAP ERP, Quality Assurance, Oracle BI, Manual Testing, UNIX, SCM, SAP IS Procurement, SAP ECC, SAP, Oracle Applications, ORACLE Order Management, Microsoft SQL Server, Informatica. Balaji has an extensive management experience (3.1 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2012-08 for 14 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Project Lead/Test Coordinator at Equinix. Since 2010-08 for 24 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Test Lead/Test Coordinator at Cricket Communications Inc.
